perturbation.original_text: 5.1   ebix shall pay to About, [**] in consideration for the Advertising Impressions as set forth in Section 4.1  [ADVERTISING IMPRESSIONS; INTEGRATION IMP...], herein, no later than seven (7) business days from the Effective Date , which shall be paid to About via wire transfer, pursuant to the following instructions:[**]
perturbation.changed_text: 5.1   ebix shall pay to About, [**] in consideration for the Advertising Impressions as set forth in Section 4.1  [ADVERTISING IMPRESSIONS; INTEGRATION IMP...], herein, no later than fifteen (15) business days from the Effective Date, which shall be paid to About via wire transfer, pursuant to the following instructions:[**]
perturbation.explanation: Changing the payment deadline from seven to fifteen business days after the Effective Date introduces a direct contradiction. This creates uncertainty as to which deadline is actually enforceable, potentially leading to disputes over late payment penalties.

perturbation.original_text: 5.2 In addition, ebix agrees to pay to About a fee of [**] for [**] and [**] from [**] up to [**] (the "Application Fees"). The payment of the Application Fees are to be due within 30 days after the end of the month in which the Application Fees were generated. Such payments shall be accompanied by a report stating the number of Filled Application Forms generated during the previous month, as well as the amount due to About. Ebix will track the number of Filled Application Forms generated by About Customers.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.2 In addition, ebix agrees to pay to About a fee of [**] for [**] and [**] from [**] up to [**] (the "Application Fees"). The payment of the Application Fees are to be due within 45 days after the end of the month in which the Application Fees were generated. Such payments shall be accompanied by a report stating the number of Filled Application Forms generated during the previous month, as well as the amount due to About. Ebix will track the number of Filled Application Forms generated by About Customers.
perturbation.explanation: Modifying the payment term from 30 days to 45 days introduces conflict, as different sections specify conflicting payment timelines, making it unclear when payments are officially considered overdue.

perturbation.original_text: 5.3   If any of the payments are not received on or before the appropriate dates       as described above, About shall have the right to charge ebix interest on       the overdue amount at the rate of 6% per year,, calculated from 30 days       after the end of the month for which payment is made until the date of       ebix's payment of such amount, which interest shall be in addition to such       fees due and owing About. In addition, About shall be entitled to its       reasonable costs and expenses (including attorneys' fees) in connection       with any action to collect fees under or to otherwise enforce this       Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.3   If any of the payments are not received on or before the appropriate dates as described above, About shall have the right to charge ebix interest on the overdue amount at the rate of 6% per year, calculated from 45 days after the end of the month for which payment is made until the date of ebix's payment of such amount, which interest shall be in addition to such fees due and owing About. In addition, About shall be entitled to its reasonable costs and expenses (including attorneys' fees) in connection with any action to collect fees under or to otherwise enforce this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: This modification changes the calculation of interest from 30 days to 45 days, which creates conflict with the original contract. This creates uncertainty about when interest begins to accrue, impacting potential late fees and costs.
